Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2016 02:58PM chantalbe wrote: I fear that I have permanent hair loss from Taxol. The only hair left on my head was the hair that was buzzed off when I got my wig. Those hairs have seemed to get longer. But the rest of my scalp hasn't changed; I can't notice any new growth. It's been a month since I ended chemo. Maybe I'm not being patient enough? I am very depressed and I don't know how I can go on without my hair. Should I try biotin or nioxin shampoo?
